revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = SR71-E |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = July 13, 2009 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Ubiquiti_Networks_SR71-E |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 002a |subvendor_id = 0777 |subdevice_id = 4e05 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = SWX-SR71E, PPD-AR5BXB92 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:15:6D
|chip1 = Atheros;AR9280; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = 2.4/5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SE2593A20;SiGe, 2593A20, 037CRHF;2;,,, EEPROM;STMicroelectronics;24C32WP;;1; |flags = high power |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/07/2011 |estreldate = 2009 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B004GIGOL6 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== SWX-SR71E redirects to PPD-AR5BXB92, which would imply this device is simply using the [[Atheros AR5BXB92]] reference design
[https://profiles.google.com/114338832271376237850/buzz/9ddX5wJJXTx lspci dump]
[https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/R3TFV4KHV4XOHA/ This particular Amazon review] indicates that the card is not outputting anything higher than 10 dBm (10 mW) per port under normal circumstances with ath9k and Ubuntu 14.04. :They also refer to [http://xiaopan.co/forums/threads/alfa-tx-power-measurement-results-and-some-other-cards-too.5378/ this post @ xiaopan.co], which noted a measured power of 155 mW (21.9 dBm) and a limit of 10 dBm if EEPROM-set channel/TX settings were tampered with.
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="not great quality, but better than nothing" mode="slideshow"> File:Ubiquiti_SR71-E_top.jpg|top File:Ubiquiti_SR71-E_top_can_off.jpg|top, RF can off </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
